headline: Is Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Still Attractive After 5-Year 4.5x Share Price Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Marathon Petroleum's share price still offers value, or if most of the opportunity is already reflected, you are in the right place. The stock trades at US$175.54, with returns of 0.3% over the past week, a 5.5% decline over the past month, 6.3% year to date, 22.3% over the past year, and a very large gain over the past 5 years that is close to 4.5x. Recent attention on Marathon Petroleum has centered on its share price performance and how current conditions in...
